concept.title: Cinnamon Swirl Brioche Bread
concept.shortdesc: This recipe describes how to make a cinnamon swirl brioche roll.

conbody.p: There's nothing better than the smell of fresh bread and warm cinnamon wafting through your kitchen. Although working with yeast can sound intimidating, it is just like any other baking ingredient - following directions and proper execution will result in a wonderfully delicious baked good for your and your loved ones to enjoy.
